Title: Mors Praematura
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Dan Dietz, Sean Hennen (executive story editor), Nic Van Zeebroeck (story), Michael Sopczynski (story)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Taraji P. Henson, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker
Plot: Reese and Finch go on separate missions. Finch has noticed that Shaw has been less responsive than she even usually is and he sends Reese to go find her. Reese initially discovers evidence ...
